    public class Checkbox
extends Control

        public void addCheckedChangedListener(java.lang.String methodName,
                                      java.lang.Object target)
        Add a listener for when the the checkbox has been checked/unchecked. Only triggered when the user presses the Checkbox and not if set programatically.
        Parameters:
        methodName - method name
        target - object
